name: John Joyce, M.D.
tweet_text: The case is closed. It is now our duty as members of Congress to move on and get back to work for the American people and address important issues like the crisis at the southern border, which I witnessed first-hand this week.

name: John Joyce, M.D.

tweet_text: Democrats supported border security funding in the past. What changed? They need to come to the table so we can open the government. Take a listen to my discussion on the shutdown with @Newstalk1037fm here → https://t.co/w1RZsRKwqM

name: John Joyce, M.D.
tweet_text: Tonight, House Democrats voted to revive Obamacare. As a physician, I know from experience how the Affordable Care Act has failed to put the patient first. It's time to replace it once and for all. Read my full statement here → https://t.co/bVEWyTTPyQ

name: John Joyce, M.D.
